markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Herald](/Traits.aspx?ID=330)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 85</row>

Nearly all deities have a specific representative known as a herald; heralds are as diverse in their appearances and abilities as the gods themselves. A creature with the herald type is always [unique](/Traits.aspx?ID=161).
name: Herald
